ScenarioDescription: 5 people (numbered from 1 to 5) want to cross a river.
Each of them dislikes both of his neighbors:
1 dislikes 5 and 2, 2 dislikes 1 and 3, ..., 5 dislikes 4 and 1
- the raft can hold maximum 2 people
- if 2 people dislike each other, they refuse to be either on the raft together or on the same bank together without any other person
